    • Constructor Detail

      • PaperTouchScreen

        public PaperTouchScreen()
        Zero arguments can be invoked only when a Papart object was created.

      • PaperTouchScreen

        public PaperTouchScreen(Papart papart)
        Create a touchScreen from a Papart object. It will use the default camera for tracking, display and touchInput.
        Parameters:
        papart -

      • PaperTouchScreen

                        Camera cam,
                        BaseDisplay proj,

        Manual instanciation without a Papart object.
        Parameters:
        applet -
        cam -
        proj -
        touchinput -

    • Method Detail

      • pre

        public void pre()
        Called by Processing, do not call. This method prepares the display if necessary and the start the touch input.
        Overrides:
        pre in class PaperScreen

      • setLocation

        public void setLocation(processing.core.PVector v)
        Add a vector to the tracked location. Then updates the touch.
        Overrides:
        setLocation in class PaperScreen
        Parameters:
        v - in millimeters

      • setLocation

                        float y,

        Add a vector to the tracked location. Then updates the touch.
        Overrides:
        setLocation in class PaperScreen
        Parameters:

      • getTouchList

        public TouchList getTouchList()
        List of the touch Points. See the TouchList class, it is a wrapper class for ArrayList (Touch).
        Returns:
        list of Touch objects.

      • getTouchInput

        public TouchInput getTouchInput()
        The touchInput is the main element that gives touch elements. Ex: a depthTouchInput for depth camera, or a colorTouchInput for colored inputs.
        Returns:
